Package edu.sjsu.assignment4

Class MonthlyAppointment

java.lang.Object
edu.sjsu.assignment4.Appointment
edu.sjsu.assignment4.MonthlyAppointment
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<Appointment>
public class MonthlyAppointment extends Appointment
MonthlyAppointment is an Appointment that occurs once a month between startDate and endDate, on the same day of the month as startDate.

  • Constructor Details

    • MonthlyAppointment

      public MonthlyAppointment(String description, LocalDate startDate, LocalDate endDate)
      MonthlyAppointment constructs an Appointment that occurs once a month
      Parameters:
      description - String containing description for new MonthlyAppointment
      startDate - LocalDate that contains date appointments begin
      endDate - LocalDate that contains date appointments end

  • Method Details

    • occursOn

      public boolean occursOn(LocalDate date)
      occursOn checks if this Appointment occurs on a given date
      Specified by:
      occursOn in class Appointment
      Parameters:
      date - LocalDate to compare against this Appointment
      Returns:
      true if date is on or between startDate and endDate AND is on the same day of the month as startDate, otherwise false.
